inputs.remark:
缺少V2，V1 为基础听力测试，V2为APD评估
测试遗漏：PST Qualitative; SSW RNC/LNC/Type A/Order Effect/SIR; SCAN-3A Ear Advantage

logic_summary: Split encounters into V1 (Basic Hearing) and V2 (APD Evaluation) as per remarks.
Moved APD-related tests (Hypersensitivity, Speech-in-noise, Temporal, Phonological, Dichotic) to V2.
Added missing 'Phonemic Synthesis Qualitative' score to Auditory Phonological Processing test.
Added missing SSW metrics (RNC, LNC, Type A, Order Effect, SIR) and SCAN-3A Ear Advantage to Dichotic Listening test.

history.present_illness: Patient reports inability to follow verbal instructions and social conversations. She experiences significant distress and negative behavioral reactions (flinching, grimacing) to loud sounds.
history.otologic_history: Evaluated twice by school audiologist; results were normal hearing. No history of ear infections mentioned.
history.noise_exposure_history: Not significant, but reports intolerance to everyday environmental noises.
history.medical_psych_history: Diagnosed with anxiety disorder as an adolescent. Received remedial educational services and IEP (extended time, note taker).
history.prior_management: Previous audiologic evaluations ruled out peripheral hearing loss. Accommodations in school included note takers and extended test time.
history.patient_goals: Determine the cause of listening difficulties and sound intolerance.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.key_findings: Hearing within normal limits at 250 to 8,000 Hz bilaterally.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.key_findings: Normal Speech Recognition Thresholds (SRT) and Word Recognition Scores (WRS) in quiet.

tests.name: Immittance audiometry
tests.key_findings: Normal ear canal volume, middle ear pressure, and static compliance. Ipsilateral acoustic reflexes normal 500-4000 Hz.

tests.name: Auditory Hypersensitivity Assessment
tests.key_findings: Significant hypersensitivity. Tolerance thresholds were considerably lower than normal (90 dB HL). Negative reactions included flinching and grimacing.

tests.name: Speech-in-noise
tests.key_findings: Performance within normal limits for W-22 in noise and SCAN-3A Auditory Figure-Ground.

tests.name: Auditory Temporal Processing
tests.key_findings: Normal temporal processing abilities on both Time Compressed Sentences and Pitch Pattern Sequence tests.

tests.name: Auditory Phonological Processing
tests.key_findings: Normal phonological processing on Phonemic Synthesis and Filtered Words tests.

tests.name: Dichotic Listening (Integration)
tests.key_findings: Significant deficits in auditory integration. Abnormal performance on Competing Words (Free and Directed Recall) and Staggered Spondaic Word (SSW) test. Competing Sentences (separation task) was normal.
